Pen as a keychain: Attach a pen to a keychain to have a pen readily available in your pocket or bag for quick writing or note-taking.
Pen as a zipper pull: Attach a pen to the zipper of a jacket or bag, making it easy to locate and access your keys or keys in your pocket.
Pen as a plant marker: Write the name of each plant on a pen and stick it into the soil to help you remember the type of plant you have planted.
Pen as a paperweight: Place a pen on top of a stack of papers to prevent them from blowing away or getting mixed up.
Pen as a pencil sharpener: Use a pen to sharpen a pencil by cutting off the dull end and creating a sharp point.
